entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:05 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
